meanings.definition: Buy back something that one has previously sold.
meanings.sent1: After selling my old bike, I am repurchasing it from the buyer.
meanings.sent2: She decided to repurchase her childhood home after regretting selling it.
meanings.sent3: The toy store owner kept repurchasing the same broken toys from the kids.
meanings.sent4: The company is repurchasing its shares to regain control of the market.
meanings.sent5: Repurchasing the antique vase felt like reclaiming a piece of history.

meanings.sent1: I am repurchasing my favorite book because I lost my old copy.
meanings.sent2: They are repurchasing the concert tickets for the rescheduled show.
meanings.sent3: He kept repurchasing the same brand of shoes because he loved them so much.
meanings.sent4: Repurchasing the same video game brought back nostalgic memories.
meanings.sent5: She is repurchasing her wedding dress for the vow renewal ceremony.
